Name: Sort Me
description: A modular tool that scans your multi-language codebase, detects folder relocations and automatically updates import/include statements (JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, C++). Designed to reduce manual refactoring effort when restructuring project directories. Includes dependency graph generation, change preview UI, and undo capabilities.

Name: Intergrate Me
description: Cross-platform Integrated Development Environment (Windows, Linux, Android) with unified UI, high-performance build pipelines, plugin architecture, version-control integration (Git + Mercurial), and live debugging support. Focused on streamlining workflows across devices and OSes for full-stack developers.

Name: OffLee
description: Offline-first coding-challenge learning application that brings the experience of algorithmic problem solving without an internet connection. Users can attempt curated problems, see immediate test-case feedback, explore hints, track progress locally, and sync later when online. Ideal for limited-connectivity environments or distraction-free practice.
